translations.banner: MAKE YOUR HEALTHY BODY STRONG IS OUR RESPONSIBILITY

aboutUs.title: Who We Are
aboutUs.desc: Salla Ghadha Catering Services was founded in 2022 with the goal of providing comprehensive, healthy meals for children under the brand name 'Mr. Carrot.' Our mission is to improve the quality of nutrition for children in schools and homes. We strive to be the first choice for parents and schools that care about the health and well-being of children.

data_1.title: Vision
data_1.details: To become the leader in providing healthy and balanced meals for children, contributing to the creation of a healthy and strong generation with good dietary habits.

data_2.title: Mission
data_2.details: To provide healthy and safe meals for children using fresh, high-quality ingredients while considering the specific nutritional needs of each child, and to contribute to educating the community about the importance of healthy nutrition.

data_3.title: Specific Goals
data_3.details_1: Improving children's health: Providing balanced meals that contribute to healthy and sound growth for children.
data_3.details_2: Educating the community: Raising awareness about the importance of healthy nutrition for children and its impact on their overall health.
data_3.details_3: Market expansion: Reaching as many schools and families as possible in different regions.

data_4.title: Values and Principles
data_4.details_1: Health and Safety: We prioritize children's health and safety above all.
data_4.details_2: Quality: We are committed to delivering the best products and services at the highest levels of quality.
data_4.details_3: Trust: We build relationships based on trust with parents and schools.
data_4.details_4: Innovation: We continuously seek new and innovative ways to improve our services and products.

data_5.title: Mr. Carrot's Social Responsibility
data_5.details: In today's world, corporate social responsibility (CSR) has become an essential part of business strategies. With growing consumer awareness of the social and environmental roles of companies, many companies are adopting responsible practices that go beyond just offering products and services. Mr. Carrot, provided by Salla Ghadha Catering Services, is a great example of a company that integrates high-quality services with community contributions.

data_6.title: The Importance of Social Responsibility for Mr. Carrot
data_6.details: By offering healthy meals to children, Mr. Carrot adopts a vision aimed at improving children's health and dietary habits. Some of the key aspects of Mr. Carrot's social responsibility include:
data_6.details_1: Mr. Carrot offers balanced meals that meet children's nutritional needs, contributing to their overall health and proper growth. With careful attention to nutritional details, Mr. Carrot strives to combat obesity and childhood diseases caused by poor nutrition.
data_6.details_2: Mr. Carrot provides three different meal plans: one for healthy children, one for children with chronic illnesses, and one for children with food allergies. This variety ensures that all children's needs are met and reflects Mr. Carrot's commitment to offering safe and healthy meals for everyone.
data_6.details_3: Mr. Carrot aims to raise awareness among children and parents about the importance of proper nutrition and its effect on general health. This includes distributing educational materials and organizing interactive workshops to enhance children's understanding of healthy eating.
data_6.details_4: Mr. Carrot supports local communities by collaborating with local suppliers to ensure fresh, high-quality ingredients. This collaboration helps support the local economy and reduces the carbon footprint associated with transportation.

data_7.title: Mr. Carrot's Commitment to Transparency and Credibility
data_7.details: Mr. Carrot emphasizes the importance of transparency in all aspects of its operations. The company provides clear and accurate information about meal ingredients and asks parents to provide accurate health information about their children to ensure the delivery of safe and appropriate meals. Additionally, the company allows subscription suspension or cancellation based on a clear and transparent policy, reinforcing customer trust.

conclusion.title: Conclusion
conclusion.details: Mr. Carrot's commitment to social responsibility extends beyond offering high-quality meals; it also includes a broader positive impact on society and the environment. By adopting sustainable and responsible practices, Mr. Carrot contributes to building a healthy and thriving community and serves as a role model in the catering services sector.

signinPage.acceptTermsError: You should accept terms and privacy policy

termsAndPrivacyPolicy.introductionDescription: Welcome to 'Mr Carrot' website. We are committed to providing healthy meals for children and promoting good nutrition. By using this website, you agree to abide by our policies and terms. Please read this document carefully to ensure that you fully understand your rights and obligations when using our services.
termsAndPrivacyPolicy.collectionOfInformationDescription1: We collect personal information such as name, email, contact number, home address and school address via map when you register or place an order.
termsAndPrivacyPolicy.collectionOfInformationDescription2: We also collect additional information such as health information specific to the child to improve the service provided.
termsAndPrivacyPolicy.useOfInformationDescription1: We use personal information to fulfill meal requests, communicate with customers, and improve our services.
termsAndPrivacyPolicy.useOfInformationDescription2: We may use the information to analyze trends and improve user experience.
termsAndPrivacyPolicy.sharingInformationDescription: We do not share your personal information with any third party unless it is necessary to fulfill your request or required by law.
termsAndPrivacyPolicy.informationSecurityDescription1: We take security measures to protect personal information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure.
termsAndPrivacyPolicy.informationSecurityDescription2: We use encryption technologies and security measures to protect your data.
termsAndPrivacyPolicy.userRightsDescription1: User has the right to access and update personal information at any time.
termsAndPrivacyPolicy.userRightsDescription2: User has the right to request deletion of personal information unless there is a legal reason to retain it.
termsAndPrivacyPolicy.registrationAndAccountDescription1: Users must provide accurate and complete information when Registration.
termsAndPrivacyPolicy.registrationAndAccountDescription2: The user is committed to maintaining the confidentiality of account information and not sharing login data with others.
termsAndPrivacyPolicy.ordersAndPaymentDescription1: Orders can be placed through the site using the available payment methods.
termsAndPrivacyPolicy.ordersAndPaymentDescription2: All orders must be paid in advance, and we only accept secure payment methods.
termsAndPrivacyPolicy.deliveryAndReceiptDescription1: We are committed to delivering meals on time to the specified address.
termsAndPrivacyPolicy.deliveryAndReceiptDescription2: In the event of any unexpected delay, we will inform you as soon as possible.
termsAndPrivacyPolicy.cancellationAndRefundDescription1: The order cannot be canceled before the specified delivery date by at least 48 hours.
termsAndPrivacyPolicy.cancellationAndRefundDescription2: It is Refund in case of cancellation according to our refund policy.
termsAndPrivacyPolicy.cancellationAndRefundDescription3: Subscription cannot be cancelled after 72 hours of subscription.
termsAndPrivacyPolicy.monthlySubscriptionDescription2: Monthly subscription can be paused by request submitted 48 hours before the specified day.
termsAndPrivacyPolicy.monthlySubscriptionDescription3: The user has the right to request to pause the subscription for 3 days only, and the subscription will be effective again after this period.
termsAndPrivacyPolicy.monthlySubscriptionDescription4: The user has the right to request to pause the subscription once a month.
termsAndPrivacyPolicy.availablePackagesDescription2: We are keen to provide meals tailored to each category according to their health needs.
termsAndPrivacyPolicy.availablePackagesDescription3: We provide a health questionnaire to ensure that the meal we provide is suitable for the child's health condition.
termsAndPrivacyPolicy.responsibilityAndGuaranteesDescription: We are committed to providing healthy and safe meals for children. We are not responsible for any unannounced allergic reactions or the provision of inaccurate health information from the parent.
termsAndPrivacyPolicy.modificationsAndUpdatesDescription: We reserve the right to modify this policy and terms at any time. Users will be notified of any changes via email or through the Site.
termsAndPrivacyPolicy.contactUsDescription: If you have any questions or concerns about our policy and terms, please contact us via:

ourProcess.title: About Our Process
ourProcess.text: We have provided a control system based on scientific foundations that achieve the highest levels of safety and quality required by international standards through our factory with an area exceed of 5,000 cubic meters and produces more than 40 tons per day of fresh products, besides an integrated logistical service through our fleet to ensure that it reaches the customer in an easy and high-quality way.

foodSafety.title: Food Safety
foodSafety.text: Dan Foods believes in Food Safety. We take Food Safety very seriously. so our customers trust us to provide them with the safest products. We also believe in customer services and always put our valued customers first.

customersSay.title: What our Customers Say?
customersSay.subtitle: Dan believes delicious, nutritious food is not a luxury. We see it as our responsibility to continually innovate ways to make delicious fruit and vegetables enjoyable and affordable anytime

review1.review: First Life before Company was very chaotic — we got a lot of phone calls, a lot of mistyped orders. So with Company, the ability to see the order directly from the customer makes it so streamlined.
